Articles.Content: I crashed my ssto and this happened.http://imgur.com/a/4QWda
Yeah it's a known glitch when you crash. Those KIA screens are still around.
Ok it's never happened to me before.
Probably one of the most innocent bugs around. Far better than having your space-planes blow up thousands of meters in the air from "colliding with the launchpad" as said by the F3 logs.
